name: Gachaga Champ
overview:
Gachaga Champ (ガチャガチャンプ Gachaga Chanpu?) is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 1999 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami.
Two joysticks to compete in a wide variety of challenges. Players can take the challenge solo or go head to head with another player. Over 40 fun and addictive mini-games, it’s a great fun for both children and adults!
